roleset.name: (cause to) become a darker brown color

role.descr: description of tan, attribute of arg1

example.name: adjectival
example.text: At the ritzy Fashion Island Shopping Center, the tanned and elegant ladies of this wealthy Southern California beach community disembark from their Mercedes-Benzes and BMWs for another day of exercising their credit cards.

example.name: verbal
example.text: Three weeks of slaving away in the hot sun tanned John a deep purple.
example.arg: Three weeks of slaving away in the hot sun

roleset.note: Frames file for 'tan' based on sentences in wsj; adjectival 'tan' found in Verbnet entry other_cos-45.4.

example.name: adjectival rel: tan
example.text: The surface is tan , granular and grossly intact with focal scanty tan membranous adhesions .
example.arg: with focal scanty tan membranous adhesions
